content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the court has made a final resolution regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court has decided to divide the property including buildings and land between the two parties the court has also awarded the applicant a chrysler town country car while the defendant has been awarded a garage other buildings and several cars the court has declared that the contractual obligations of a consumer credit agreement will be assumed jointly and severally by both parties the applicant has brought a legal action to dissolve their marriage and has submitted various claims including the division of matrimonial property and requesting maintenance for the children the court will consider all the claims and make a decision accordingly the costs of the proceedings will be awarded proportionally based on the success of each claim the court has ordered the defendant to pay the applicant an amount to fulfill their joint obligations and to repay a consumer credit agreement the remainder of the action including a claim for nonmaterial damage has been dismissed the defendant is ordered to pay the applicants costs while the applicant is ordered to pay the state costs

metadata.cost: 589.68 EUR (professional fees) + 210.34 EUR  (court fees) to be borne by the defendant + 7.32 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
